title: LA River
name: LA River
description:
A Map by Toiletking

This is where the adventures of &quot;Buck&quot; and Jim will take place. Similar to the experiences that are in The Adventures of Huckleberry Finn, Buck and Jim will learn what America is really about.

properties.name: 1st Encounter- Dead Man
properties.description: Posted by ToiletkingBuck and Jim find the body of a dead man. inside an Escalate convertible. The car is on the side of the river with a door open. Clothes and undergarments of women lie inside and the ones that are outside of the car are wet and dirty in the river. Along with that, are pictures of women, condoms, ALOT of alcohol and the car is slashed on the tires, glass and chasis with many dirty words. Buck and Jim observe all of the items that were inside the car and decided to take some of it, just in case they need to use it in the future. Not wanting to get any attention to themselves, they decide to not call the cops and just walk away, despite how wrong it is.

properties.name: 2nd Encounter- Thieves
properties.description: Posted by ToiletkingBuck and Jim encounter three thieves that have just robbed a couple of houses. Two of them thinking about killing the other because he almost doublecrossed them. Unable to do anything because the thieves were armed, they leave. But before they did, Buck decided to call the cops through a pay phone becuase he felt bad for the guy that was about to get killed.

properties.name: 3rd Encounter- Gang Rivals
properties.description: Posted by ToiletkingBuck finds himself seperated from Jim and with a group of gangsters. This gang is involved in a long and violent feud against their rival gang. Buck acts like he\'s one of them for his safety. After a couple of acts of violence, the two gangs face off in a huge shoot out war. Keeping his distance, Buck remains safe as he watches the gang that had accepted him slowly and painfully die. He escapes the war after he sees Jim nearby and they both leave off to their adventure again.

properties.name: Library
properties.description: Posted by ToiletkingHere, Buck decides to use the women\'s clothes that he and Jim found in the dead man\'s car. He disguises himself, to not be recognized by anyone, and goes in this library. He uses a computer, goes on Myspace, talks to his old friends, using a different name, to find out what has been going on with his disappearence. He learns that people saw him and Jim together and sees this headline on a news webpage: "High School Teenager kidnapped by janitor."

properties.name: Miss Watson's House
properties.description: Posted by ToiletkingThis is where Miss Watson and Buck live. She adopted Buck becuase she saw that he was a really good kid, even though he was in Juvie. Day and night, Miss Watson tries to teach Buck more about what is right and wrong.

properties.name: School
properties.description: Posted by ToiletkingWhere Buck use to go to school and Jim goes to work. Jim is a janitor who is forced to live in the storage room because he has no other place to live. Buck is a student who isn\'t really interested in his studies. He would rather make jokes than to do homework. Buck and Tom are best friends and they enjoy making fun of others. One day they ditch their math class and see Jim\'s utility room open. They walk inside and find so many unusual things. They hear footsteps and they each hide behind different things on each side of the room. Jim enters. "Who in here?!" Jim asks. He walks to a chair in the middle of the room. "I know I was hearing somethin. I\'ll just sit here and wait." A few minutes pass by and Buck\'s legs begin to hurt from squatting for so long; he repositions himself to get comfortable, almost tipping over a lamp on the ground. Just then, Buck and Tom hear a snore coming from Jim so they immedietly get out, leaving the door open. A while later, Miss Watson is with the superintendent of the school. They are outside of Jim\'s room and she sees that his door is open; she peeks in. "He\'s sleeping right now. I know he will cooperate with us so I say we wait until he is awake to tell him that he can no longer work here." Miss Watson tells him. "Fine. Just make sure he takes everything with him. We cannot have an immigrant working here, much less living here! I cannot belive you let this happen Miss Watson!" the suerintendent replied. "Yes... It won\'t happen again..." Miss Watson answered back. "I\'ll be glad to see this immigrant deported back to Mexico!" he said. They both leave. Inside Jim immidietly gets up and begins to pack his most important objects and gets out of there quickly.

properties.name: The Beginning
properties.description: Posted by ToiletkingThis is where Buck and Jim meet and leave everything behind to start their adventure. Right before leaving, they talk about what they are leaving behind and why they are leaving.
